title: Chrome Extension Changelog | Labuladong Algo Notes

Info

This page is the update log for the Chrome extension. For a detailed user guide, see Chrome Extension Guide.

v6.0.2

v5.0.9

v5.0.6

v5.0.5

v5.0.3

v5.0.2

v5.0.1

v4.4.7

Major Improvement

Significantly improved the accuracy of multi-language solutions in the thought sections.

v4.4.6

bug fix

Fixed an issue where the article links in the plugin's thought sections were still referencing the old version of the course. To resolve this, follow the method described in the Chrome Plugin Manual to pull the data again.

v4.4.5

v4.4.0

Major Update

The visualization panel now includes an "Edit" button, allowing users to modify their solution code directly in the panel and run it to verify their ideas:

Breaking Change

The plugin has been adapted for my new website labuladong.online, and will no longer support the Xiaoe platform.

Readers who previously purchased courses on Xiaoe can migrate their course permissions to the new website; the migration guide can be found here. The method for unlocking course-specific solutions in the plugin based on the new website has been updated in the first chapter of the course.
